name: Summer!!!
description:
Defend your sand temple, it is under attack. Lot of angry crabs and birds are trying to destroy it. CONTROLS: - Touch: Push the enemies - Shake: Swap the element (Sand for crabs, Air for birds and Water for both of them) NOTE: Daylight depends on the time.

Jam Site: GranadaJam

Diversifiers: Time Lord:Your game offers variations based on the time of day it is played.

Platforms: Android

deviceTools And Technologies: Corona SDKInstallation Instructions:

- Install the .apk file in an Android device
